titles.title: Celebrating the 29th Congressional Art Competition and commending the winners of the Competition on achieving a high level of artistic scholastic aptitude.
Celebrating the 29th Congressional Art Competition and commending the winners of the Competition on achieving a high level of artistic scholastic aptitude.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on House Administration.

bill.summary: Celebrates the 29th anniversary of the Congressional Art Competition. Commends the winners of the Competition on achieving a high level of artistic scholastic aptitude in their respective competitions.
